result.title: Strange behaviour in codeforces judging
result.content:
Hi

I submitted the following code for 254A (div1) and got WA: http://codeforces.com/contest/444/submission/7022941 However, after changing long longs to ints and long doubles to doubles I got AC: http://codeforces.com/contest/444/submission/7027365

Could any of you explain why did it happen that way?

Regards
